meanings.sent1: The lipocytes in our body help store excess fat for energy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how lipocytes store fat to understand obesity better.
meanings.sent3: The lipocytes had a party and stored so much fat, they couldn't move!
meanings.sent4: Her lipocytes were like tiny treasure chests, holding onto every bit of fat.
meanings.sent5: The lipocytes were like diligent workers, carefully storing fat for later use.

meanings.sent1: When we gain weight, our lipocytes increase in size to store more fat.
meanings.sent2: Lipocytes play a crucial role in regulating the body's fat levels.
meanings.sent3: The lipocytes threw a fat party and invited all the excess calories!
meanings.sent4: Her lipocytes were like little balloons, expanding as they stored more fat.
meanings.sent5: The lipocytes were like tiny warehouses, packed full of fat reserves.
